text: <@U013ZLJARC7> thanks for that recollection and story about tappers/listeners... this is a great reminder of why teachers, educators (and 'communicators') are professionals who's skills should be recognised and appropriately valued (within society), as that process of bridging between different points of understanding is (often) by no means easy, and as you say, can be easy to even lose sight of from one's own point of understanding... #fairpayforteachers! :wink:

text: <@UBKNXPBAB> If you had any specific thoughts on this talk by the way, I'd love to hear them!
